Description: Unique identifier of the collection
Title of the collection of files in English
Example: nCoV line listings from DXY.cn maintained by NIH Fogarty

Description: Original title of the collection of filfes, in original language, per original source
Path of collection in the repository
Language of collection content
Organization or people who created the collection
Contact information for creator of the collection
Organization or people who published the collection online
Description of the collection
Example: 2019 Novel Coronavirus line listings obtained exclusively from DXY.cn by manual data entry. DXY.cn (DīngXiāngYuán) is an online community for medical professionals and news sharing of medical importance. DXY.cn provides a curated list of broadcasts for 2019 nCoV case reports from official Chinese sources: https://3g.dxy.cn/newh5/view/pneumonia

Description: URL of the original source of the collection
File format of the collection members
Number of files in the collection
List of members (files) in the collection
Example: <list names of files in the collection>

Description: Date of the first reported case in the data collection (as yyyy-mm-dd)
Date of the last reported case in the data collection (as yyyy-mm-dd)
License describing conditions for use/distribution of files in the collection
Access protocol (how can files be accessed from the source)
Example: Google Sheet that can be downloaded

Description: Collection of file related to this collection
Path to the related object in the repository
Description of the relationship of the related object and this collection
Notes related to curation of the collection
Date on which the collection was last updated (as yyyy-mm-dd)
Name, affiliation, and ID (ORCID, Publon ID, other) of person who last updated the collection
Example: Wilbert van Panhuis, University of Pittsburgh, ORCID 0000-0002-7278-9982

Description: Email of the person who last updated the collection
